metadata.title: USN-4627-1 -- Linux kernel vulnerability
metadata.description: Moritz Lipp, Michael Schwarz, Andreas Kogler, David Oswald, Catherine Easdon, Claudio Canella, and Daniel Gruss discovered that the Intel Running Average Power Limit (RAPL) driver in the Linux kernel did not properly restrict access to power data. A local attacker could possibly use this to expose sensitive information.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4627-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  linux-image-3.13.0-183-powerpc-smp - 3.13.0-183.234 linux-image-3.13.0-183-powerpc64-smp - 3.13.0-183.234 linux-image-3.13.0-183-powerpc64-emb -
